column1: 47 - Odkial si. Johanna? - Z Nemecka - Co robis na Slevensku? - Studujem tu dizajin - Dizajin? Hm. Zaujimauve - a co stdujes ty? - Nestudujem. Pracujem. Som Manazer -Nie si student? column2: Odkial si. Johanna? = where are you from Johanna? - Z Nemecka = From Germany - Co robis na Slevensku? = What are you doing in Slevensk? - Studujem tu dizajin = I study design here - Dizajin? Hm. Zaujimauve = Design? Um. Interesting - a co stdujes ty? = and what are you studying? - Nestudujem. Pracujem. Som Manazer = I don't study. I'm working. I'm a Manager - Nie si student? Kolko mas rokov? = Aren't you a student? How old are you? - Tridsat. A ty? = Thirty. And you? - Ja Mam Dvadsatjeden = I'm twenty-one - Hovoris dobre po slovensky = You speak Slovak well - Dakujem = Thank you - Ja nehovorim po nemecky = I don't speak German - Nevadi ja sa ucim po slovensky = Never mind I'm learning Slovak

column1: 48 - Aha. To je robert a jeho kamart carlo. Ahoj Robert. Cau Carlo - Ahojte - Caute - Johanna. Toto je moj kamarat carlo. Carlo je moj kolega - Ahoj Carlo. Ja so johanna - Tesi ma. A co ty? studujes alebo pracujes?  = I am working. I'm a manager. What about you? are you studying or working? - studujem dizajin = I study design - po slovensky? = In slovak? - nie. po anglicky. ale ucim sa slencinu = no. in English. but I'm learning slovak - ja tiez = Me too
